channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2024101721
item.description:
Report X-2024101721

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-21
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PRELOADER NOTED COLORED LIQUID COMING FROM BOX. RESPONDER CALLED TO RETRIEVE. PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND CONTENTS IDENTIFIED AS NAIL POLISH, LATER TO BE DETEREMINED TO BE OPI NAIL LACQUER 0.5FL OZ BOTTLE. RESPONDER TRANSPORTED PACKAGE TO DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.
